data.eml:eml: INNS records held by BIS in Powys and Brecon Beacons National Park

INNS records collated and digitised by BIS. Collated for nature conservation and management. Mainly from field observation but may include targeted surveys. Records are validated for geographical area on import to BIS database. BIS makes every effort to exchange with county recorders for verification but due to the historical nature of this dataset most records are unverified. Data will have been collected by local experts, volunteers and members of the public.
